thread.title: Adele confirmed she's married now and we missed it
thread.title_full: Adele confirmed she's married now and we missed it

author: Katie Jones
title: Adele confirmed she's married now and we missed it
text:
Adele's Grammys acceptance speech was so emotional, we missed her revealing some major news at this year's awards. The singer appeared to confirm she is now married to her partner of six years, Simon Konecki. Now that's a wedding dress we REALLY need to see.
Getty The singer shared the great news in her final acceptance speech of the evening. After she picked up four prizes earlier in the night, including Record of the Year for 'Hello', Adele returned to the stage to accept her fifth Grammy for Album of the Year. In her speech, she paid tribute to Beyonc√© for her "monumental" album Lemonade and revealed that she became pregnant with her son Angelo after her big Grammys night five years ago.
